name: Inverted
description: Inverted is a new game that calling for amazement and joy of people who like stretch their brains. The main character of this puzzle by mysterious accident find himself in a castle full of solitude, fear and oblivion.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent) Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible

reviews.review_text: I wrote a bot to solve level 8 for me because it was too difficult.    Great game, I really like it! :D
